error.message: The database 'aspnetdb' cannot be opened because it is version 661. This server supports version 655 and earlier. A downgrade path is not supported. Could not open new database 'aspnetdb'. CREATE DATABASE is aborted. Cannot attach the file 'E:\Articles\ASP.NET MVC 3 Internationalization 2\VS2010-MVC3-Razor\NerdDinner\App_Data\aspnetdb.mdf' as database 'aspnetdb'.
